alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 18 at 12:46PM MDT until May 19 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR FLATHEAD LAKE... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Lake Wind Advisory on Flathead Lake, waves 1 to 3 feet with southwest winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Flathead Lake, Flathead Valley, Mission Valley, and Polson. * WHEN...For the Lake Wind Advisory, until 6 PM MDT this evening. For the Wind Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 3 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
